DocAttribute.Name: PredefinedType
DocAttribute.Documentation: Predefined generic types for a tendon.

DocAttribute.Name: NominalDiameter
DocAttribute.Documentation: The nominal diameter defining the cross-section size of the tendon.

DocAttribute.Name: CrossSectionArea
DocAttribute.Documentation: The effective cross-section area of the tendon.

DocAttribute.Name: TensionForce
DocAttribute.Documentation: The maximum allowed tension force that can be applied on the tendon.

DocAttribute.Name: PreStress
DocAttribute.Documentation: The prestress to be applied on the tendon.

DocAttribute.Name: FrictionCoefficient
DocAttribute.Documentation: The friction coefficient for the bond between the tendon and the surrounding concrete.

DocAttribute.Name: AnchorageSlip
DocAttribute.Documentation: The deformation of an anchor or slippage of tendons when the prestressing device is released.

DocAttribute.Name: MinCurvatureRadius
DocAttribute.Documentation: The smallest curvature radius calculated on the whole effective length of the tendon where the tension properties are still valid.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The attribute ObjectType shall be given, if the predefined type is set to USERDEFINED.
